data.name: AutoML Evaluation Component
data.desc: A Component show AutoML result. Interactive between sub-components . Display metrics component,  modal component to display Confusion Matrix (D3.js), char component(Chart.js), range bar

data.name: Calories Awareness
data.desc: A full feature Calories Tracker, made with Angular 10. Authentication (mail and third-party are available) made with Firebase SDK, all records summarized chart to show your records. Finally, you also download all of your records and subscribe to get a daily notification

data.name: My Informatics
data.desc: A Web Resource Organizer (drag and drop and foldable Area), powered by Angular 10
